title: Temp Email
helpTip: Please login or click "Create New Email" button to get a new email address
loggedInUserBindTip: Logged in user, login unbound email or create new email address will be bindto current user
fetchAddressError: Mail address credential is invalid or account not exist, it may be network connection issue, please try again later.
linkWithAddressCredential: Open to auto login email link
addressNameHint: Please enter email name, only allow: {{regex}}
addressNameEmptyHint: Leave empty to auto generate random address.
selectDomainHint: You can select a domain from the dropdown list.
subject: Subject
deleteMailTip: This action cannot be undone. The email will be permanently removed.
noRolesAvailable: No roles available in system config
roleConfigDesc: Configure maximum address count for each user role. Role-based limits take priority over global settings.
enableAllowList: Enable Allow List (Restrict webhook access to specific users)
webhookAllowList: Webhook Allow List(Enter the mail address that is allowed to use webhook and enter)
name: Name
tip: Third-party login will automatically use the user's email to register an account (the same email will be regarded as the same account), this account is the same as the registered account, and you can also set the password through the forget password
addressCredentialTip: Please copy the Mail Address Credential and you can use it to login
fetchUserSettingsError: Login password is invalid or account not exist, it may be network connection issue, please try again later.
passwordHashTip: The server only receives the hash of your password, not the plaintext. Therefore, your password cannot be viewed or recovered. If the admin has enabled email verification, you can reset your password in incognito mode.
emptyQueryAllAddresses: Leave empty to query all addresses
transferAddressTip: Transferring this address to another user will remove it from your account. Are you sure you want to transfer?
logoutConfirm: Are you sure you want to logout?
deleteAccountConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete your account and all emails?
clearInboxConfirm: Are you sure you want to clear all emails in your inbox?
clearSendboxConfirm: Are you sure you want to clear all emails in your sendbox?
verifyCodeSent: Verification code sent, expires in {{seconds}} seconds
resetPasswordDisabled: Email verification or registration is not enabled, cannot reset password, please contact admin
passkeyNamePlaceholder: Enter Passkey name or leave empty to auto generate
deletePasskeyConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this Passkey?
unbindAddressTip: Please switch to this email address and save the credential before unbinding.
localAddressWarning: These addresses are stored in your browser. They may be lost if you clear your browser cache.
noSendBalance: You need to request permission to send emails. If you have already requested, please contact the admin to increase your quota.
yourNameAndAddress: Your name and address, leave name empty to use email address
sendMailSuccess: Please check your sendbox. If failed, please check your balance or try again later.
deleteAttachmentConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this attachment?
clickMoreToAdmin: Click {{count}} more times to enter admin page
enterAddressQuery: Enter address to query, leave empty to query all
leaveEmptyQueryAll: Leave empty to query all addresses
enableMailVerifyHint: Enable email verification (sender address must be a valid address in the system with balance)
mailAllowListHint: Enable email address allow list (manually input, press Enter to add)
addressNameHintText: Enter the email address you want to use, only allow: {{regex}}
leaveEmptyForRandom: Leave empty to generate a random email address.
selectDomainFromList: You can select a domain from the dropdown list.
registerNewEmailHint: Please "Login" or click "Create New Email" button to get a new email address
deleteUserConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this user?
deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete?
cleanupWarning: To enable scheduled cleanup, configure [crons] parameter in worker. Refer to documentation. Setting 0 days means clear all.
cleanupNDaysInbox: Clean inbox older than n days
cleanupNDaysUnknown: Clean unknown recipient mails older than n days
cleanupNDaysSendbox: Clean sendbox older than n days
cleanupNDaysAddress: Clean addresses created n days ago
cleanupNDaysInactive: Clean inactive addresses older than n days
cleanupNDaysUnbound: Clean unbound user addresses older than n days
cleanupNDaysEmpty: Clean empty addresses older than n days
customSqlHint: Add custom DELETE SQL statements for scheduled cleanup. Only single DELETE statement allowed per record.
deleteEmailConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this email?
clearInboxConfirm: Are you sure you want to clear this inbox?
batchDeleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete selected emails?
batchClearInboxConfirm: Are you sure you want to clear selected inboxes?
